item.title: Sarah Kathryn add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "How vain it is to sit down to write when you have not stood up to live." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Sarah Kathryn add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "The pages are still blank, but there is a miraculous feeling of the words being there, written in invisible ink and clamoring to become visible." -- Vladimir Nabokov

item.title: Sarah Kathryn add a quote by Henri J.M. Nouwen
item.description: "As long as we continue to live as if we are what we do, what we have, and what other people think about us, we will remain filled with judgments, opinions, evaluations, and condemnations. We will remain addicted to putting people and things in their "right" place." -- Henri J.M. Nouwen
